subject: Good Morning.
body:
Good Morning.
Attention: Dear Sir / Madam.
Compliments and I wish to discuss a matter of urgency and utmost privacy with you. Thus, I desire that you get back to me as soon as you can.
I want you to contact me on my private-email ( 
mrjohnsavage991@gmail.com
 ).
Thanks in anticipation of your response.
Best Regards,
Mr John Savage

subject: Re:   Good Morning.
body:
Hello Mr. John Savage,

Good morning! I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your message and the urgency of the matter you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Danny
